## 1USD_MINIMUM_DEBT variable

A Trove must always have at least this much debt.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
1USD_MINIMUM_DEBT: Decimal
```

## Remarks

Any transaction that would result in a Trove with less debt than this will be reverted.
